Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2011 07:33PM Martyae wrote: DeeLJ. I had my surgery on the same day as you. I was told that i could shower. I just put band aids over where the insertion site is. I had 2 of my drains removed after a week. I am hoping that I will get the other 2 drains removed when I go back on Wednesday.
